name: The Adventures of Mr. Potato
description:
This game is a simple platformer about Mr. Potato who needs to go from point a to point b. This game was made for a school project so it is not a high quality game.

The game is a 2D platformer and it excists of 1 level (maybe more to be added later). The game is still in Alpha so there are probably bugs in there. If you find any bugs please leave a comment with what the bug is and where in the level you found it.

PLEASE NOTE:

This whole game is still being developed, so sprites and levels may change. And there is currently no menu, so to close the game you must use alt+f4 or you need to use the taskmanager.

Alpha V0.0.1
